Package com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FemTestClient.FemTestResult  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bar  
    BasicExample  
    CachedObject<T>
    This class represents a object in the entity managers cache of attached objects
    FemConfig
    This class represents the file system entity manager configuration.
    FemConfigTests  
    FemMultipleActionTests  
    FemMultipleActionXmlTests  
    FemMultiThreadedTests  
    FemObjectConfig
    This class defines The storage configuration for a specific class
    FemOcn
    This class is the super class of the wrapper used to persists object instances that have a storage data structure of OCN.
    FemRawTests  
    FemSingleActionTests  
    FemSingleActionXmlTests  
    FemTestClient  
    FemTestClient.Fault  
    FemTestClient.Success  
    FemTestClient.Waiter  
    FemTestSuite  
    FemWrapper<T>
    This class represents the wrapper that is used to wrap all object instances held in the entity managers object cache and all classes with a data structure of OCN when their objects instance is written to the file system
    FemWrapperDeserializer
    This class allows Gson to deserialize the instances of the generic class FemWrapper This is achieved through the use of a ThreadLocal variable that holds the type of the object wrapped by the wrapper.
    FilesystemEntityManager
    This class defines the thread specific entity manager that provides the API to fetch, save and delete instances of objects into and out of repositories on the file system.
    FilesystemEntityManagerFactory
    This class creates instances of file system entity managers.
    Foo  
    LocalType
    This ThreadLocal variable holds the type of object being deserialized within a wrapper by Gson
    RawExample  
    RawFoo  
    ThreadedExample  
    Too  
    XmlBar  
    XmlExample  
    XmlFoo  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FemDataFormat
    This enumeration defines the possible storage data formats supported by file system entity managers
    FemDataStructure
    This enumeration defines the data structure applied to persisted objects to support object change control
    FemTestClient.Instruction  
    FemTestClient.State  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FemDuplicateKeyException
    This checked exception is thrown when an attempt is made to save an Object instance that already exists but has not been fetched into the entity manager saving the object instance.
    FemException
    All checked exceptions thrown by the file system entity manger are super-classes of this checked exception
    FemMutatedObjectException
    This checked exception is thrown when an attempt is made to save an Object instance that already been updated and committed by a separate connection
    FemObjectLockedException
    This checked exception is thrown when an attempt is made to save or delete an object that is locked.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    FemError
    Instances of this unchecked error are thrown when the file system entity manager identifies an exception condition that should not occur under ordinary conditions.
